I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
V: world
W: world
K: hooks
A: Type
w: injects V W K
e1: DT this V A
j: state
i: state
r: cont A

Goal:
i \In Coh V -> verify i e1 (fun (x : A) (i' : state) => forall j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, i' \+ j' \In Coh W -> network_rely W2 this j j' -> r x (i' \+ j')) -> verify (i \+ j) (iinject e1) r

Premises:
Inductive DT (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := with_spec : forall s : spec A, DTbin this W s -> DT this W A Arguments DT _ _ _%type_scope Arguments with_spec [this W] [A]%type_scope [s]
cont = fun A : Type => A -> state -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments cont _%type_scope
network_rely = fun (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) => exists n : nat, network_rely' w this n s1 s2 : world -> nid -> state -> state -> Prop
Notation W2 := (inj_ext w)
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
injects = Injection.injects : world -> world -> hooks -> Type
Notation iinject x := (inject _ x)
verify : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> DT this W A -> (A -> state -> Prop) -> Prop
union_mapPCM = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) => PCM.Pack (union_mapPCMMix K V) : ordType -> Type -> pcm Arguments union_mapPCM _ _%type_scope
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
rely_ext : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> forall (this : nid) (i : state) (j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s : state), i \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (i \+ j) s -> exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, s = i' \+ j' /\ i' \In Coh V
aft_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> after i p P -> after (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & P v i'])
alw_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> always i p P -> always (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this W A) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & (exists q' : proc this V A, q = Inject w q' /\ P i' q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P i' (Ret v'))])
bind_rule : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (e1 : DT this W A) (e2 : A -> DT this W B) (i : state) (q : cont A) (r : cont B), verify i e1 q -> (forall (y : A) (j : state), q y j -> j \In Coh W -> verify j (e2 y) r) -> verify i (x <-- e1; e2 x) r
step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (e1 : DT this W A) (e2 : A -> DT this W B) (i : state) (r : cont B), verify i e1 (fun (y : A) (m : state) => verify m (e2 y) r) -> verify i (x <-- e1; e2 x) r
vrf_pre : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i i' : state) (k : cont A), verify i e k -> network_rely W this i i' -> verify i' e k
rely_split : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s1 \In Coh V -> s2 \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_rely V this s1 s2 /\ network_rely (inj_ext w) this s1' s2'
vrf_coh : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (r : A -> state -> Prop), (i \In Coh W -> verify i e r) -> verify i e r
call_rule' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (i : state) (f : DT this W A) (k : cont A), (i \In Coh W -> pre_of f i) -> (forall (x : A) (m : state), post_of f i x m -> m \In Coh W -> k x m) -> verify i f k
vrf_post : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (k : cont A), verify i e k -> verify i e (fun (x : A) (m : state) => forall m' : state, network_rely W this m m' -> k x m')
sem_extend : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), injects U V K -> forall (s1 s2 s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> s2 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)
ghC : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (e : DT this W A) (p : B -> pre) (q : B -> A -> pre), (forall (i : state) (x : B), p x i -> i \In Coh W -> verify i e (q x)) -> conseq e (logvar (fun x : B => binarify (p x) (q x)))
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Injection.Exports.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
rely_split' : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects V W K) (z : nid) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s1 \In Coh V -> s2 \In Coh V -> network_step W z (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step V z s1 s2 /\ network_step (inj_ext w) z s1' s2'
ret_rule : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (i : state) (v : A) (r : cont A), (forall m : state, network_rely W this i m -> r v m) -> verify i (ret this W v) r
act_rule : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this) (i : state) (r : cont A), (forall j : state, network_rely W this i j -> a_safe a j /\ (forall (y : A) (k m : state), (exists pf : a_safe a j, a_step pf k y) -> network_rely W this k m -> r y m)) -> verify i (act a) r
call_rule : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : Pred state) (q : A -> Pred state) (i : state) (e : DHT[this,W](p,q)) (k : cont A), (i \In Coh W -> p i) -> (forall (x : A) (m : state), q x m -> m \In Coh W -> k x m) -> verify i (with_spec e) k
Record injects (U V : world) (K : hooks) : Type := Inject { E : world; _ : hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E; _ : V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K); _ : hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K; _ : forall s : state, Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2]); _ : forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V ->...-> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step E this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2 } Arguments Injection.Inject [U V K E] _ _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
sem_split : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \In Coh U -> s2 \In Coh U -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step (inj_ext w) this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2
vrf_mono : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (r1 r2 : cont A), r1 <== r2 -> verify i e r1 -> verify i e r2
inject_frame : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (this : nid) (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s1 \+ s \In Coh (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> hook_complete U -> hook_complete W -> hooks_consistent (U \+ W).1 K -> world_not_hooked U K -> network_step (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)
cohUnKR : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s \In Coh U -> hook_complete W -> s' \In Coh W
locProjR : forall (W1 W2 : world) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s1 \+ s2 \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> l \in dom W2.1 -> s2 \In Coh W2 -> getStatelet (s1 \+ s2) l = getStatelet s2 l
cohUnKL : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s' \In Coh W -> hook_complete U -> s \In Coh U
gh_ex : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A C : Type) (s : C -> spec A) (f : DTbin this W (logvar s)) (g : C) (i : state) (k : cont A), verify i (with_spec (Do with_spec f)) k -> verify i (with_spec f) k
inject_step : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (s1' s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), valid (U \+ W) -> s1 \In Coh U -> s2 \In Coh U -> hook_complete U -> hook_complete W -> network_step (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step W this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2
extends : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), injects U V K -> union_mapPCM Label dstatelet -> union_mapPCM Label dstatelet -> Prop
locProjL : forall (W1 W2 : world) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s1 \+ s2 \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> l \in dom W1.1 -> s1 \In Coh W1 -> getStatelet (s1 \+ s2) l = getStatelet s1 l
inject_s : forall (this : nid) (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type), injects V W K -> DT this V A -> spec A

```coq
unfold verify in *.
intros.
rewrite <- rely_split' with (z:=this) (s1:=i) (s1':=j) (s2:=j) (s2':=j'); try reflexivity.
rewrite <- sem_split with (U:=W) (V:=W2) (K:=K) (w:=w); try reflexivity.
rewrite <- sem_extend with (U:=W) (V:=W2) (K:=K) (w:=w); try reflexivity.
rewrite <- rely_ext with (V:=W) (W:=W2) (K:=K) (w:=w); try reflexivity.
rewrite <- aft_inject with (V:=W) (W:=W2) (K:=K) (w:=w); try reflexivity.
rewrite <- alw_inject with (V:=W) (W:=W2) (K:=K) (w:=w); try reflexivity.
rewrite <- call_rule' with (this:=this) (W:=W) (A:=A) (i:=i) (f:=e1) (k:=r); try reflexivity.
rewrite <- step with (this:=this) (W:=W) (A:=A) (e1:=e1) (e2:=fun x => e2 x) (i:=i) (r:=r); try reflexivity.
rewrite <- vrf_pre with (this:=this) (W:=W) (A:=A) (e:=e1) (i:=i) (i':=j) (k:=r); try reflexivity.
rewrite <- vrf_post with (this:=this) (W:=W) (A:=A) (e:=e1) (i:=i) (k:=r); try reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: unfold verify in *. intros. rewrite <- rely_split' with (z:=this) (s1:=i) (s1':=j) (s2:=j) (s2':=j'); try reflexivity. rewrite <- sem_split with (U:=W) (V:=W2) (K:=K) (w:=w); try reflexivity. rewrite <- sem_extend with (U:=W) (V:=W2) (K:=K) (w:=w); try reflexivity. rewrite <- rely_ext with (V:=W) (W:=W2) (K:=K) (w:=w); try reflexivity. rewrite <- aft_inject with (V:=W) (W:=W2) (K:=K) (w:=w); try reflexivity. rewrite <- alw_inject with (V:=W) (W:=W2) (K:=K) (w:=w); try reflexivity. rewrite <- call_rule' with (this:=this) (W:=W) (A:=A) (i:=i) (f:=e1) (k:=r); try reflexivity. rewrite <- step with (this:=this) (W:=W) (A:=A) (e1:=e1) (e2:=fun x => e2 x) (i:=i) (r:=r); try reflexivity. rewrite <- vrf_pre with (this:=this) (W:=W) (A:=A) (e:=e1) (i:=i) (i':=j) (k:=r); try reflexivity. rewrite <- vrf_post with (this:=this) (W:=W) (A:=A) (e:=e1) (i:=i) (k:=r); try reflexivity.
